# Who's in town
Simple app to see artists and events.

# Disclaimer
This is the first time I have written an app in Svelte (other than a little ToDo app a year ago), so I hope you like it as my daily driver is React :).


# Setup
1. git clone
2. npm run i
3. npm run dev

**OR**
